entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
